title: [SOLVED]820-3330 Short On Adapter Sense
message: I have a board that runs fine on battery, however I get no green light on the charger. All the power rails are there and even adapter sense but only at U6901 and U6900. There is most likely an internal short on Adapter Sense as there is no continuity from pin 5 of U6901 to pin 5 of the DC In connector. Pin 5 of the DC In connector is shorted to ground along with what I assume is the associated test point nearby. Adapter sense is not shorted by U6901 however. Is there an arts and crafty way to save this board?

title: [SOLVED]820-3330 Short On Adapter Sense
message:
Your magsafe should be (more or less) similar...
Check for shorted caps on sense line.
You also have an open serie resistor (like Rp).

title: [SOLVED]820-3330 Short On Adapter Sense
message: Just isolate pin 5 of the DC connector and run a wire to U6901.

title: [SOLVED]820-3330 Short On Adapter Sense
message: Thanks Duke I did that covered it with some kapton tape to look official and it is working nicely!
